mapper.select: SELECT p.*, COALESCE(AVG(c.rating), 0) AS averageRating, COUNT(c.id) AS commentCount, COALESCE(SUM(od.quantity), 0) AS totalSells FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON p.id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN t_order_detail od ON p.id = od.product_id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY averageRating DESC, totalSells DESC, p.id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.type, p.price, p.img, p.description, p.mode, COUNT(c.id) AS commentCount, COALESCE(AVG(c.rating), 0) AS averageStars, COALESCE(SUM(d.quantity), 0) AS totalSells FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON p.id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN t_order_detail d ON p.id = d.product_id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY averageStars DESC LIMIT 5
